text: 0 Hello, nice to meet you! I am your personal assistant for the time being; it seems I have no choice in the matter.  If you need anything let me know.
1 And I almost forgot, how should I refer to you?
2 Okay, since you're complaining, I won't insist.
Hi {userName} I'm Kayleigh. Okay, look around here while I'm nearby if anything happens.
